json.text: This is Loki. The trickster, the deceiver.
He sacrifices durability in favor of speed.
Mastering Loki is not about outgunning your opponents, it’s about outsmarting them.
Well equipped for confusing and distracting his enemies,
Loki becomes an incredible asset to his team.
Decoy allows Loki to draw enemy fire away from himself and his teammates
or to seek out a hidden threat.
If there is trouble ahead, Invisibility allows Loki to camouflage himself to
remain undetected from censors and cause extra damage on sneak melee attacks.
To aid in your enemies’ confusion, or escape a tough situation, Loki can utilize
Switch Teleport to trade places with his target, be it your enemy, a decoy, or even a teammate.
When the battle intensifies, Tenno, Loki can use Radial Disarm to disrupt his enemies' weapons
forcing them to resort to melee combat.
Loki can wreak havoc within the solar system if used correctly and can utilize mods to enhance his abilities.
Equipping range-extending mods will allow you to distract enemies from further away
or reach greater distances when a quick escape is required.
Utilizing fusion cores to upgrade Invisibility and Radial Disarm will help keep you hidden longer
and causing even wider radius of enemy malfunction.
Whether you prefer to go into battle alone or with a team, Tenno, Loki will adapt to any style.
